chapter.title: Subscribe to emails and feeds to notify you of changes in your Mingle project
chapter.p: Receive notification of important changes in your Mingle project by email or Atom feed.

topic.title: Subscribe to a card or a wiki page
topic.p: You can subscribe to individual cards or wiki pages to receive change notifications via email or Atom feed.

topic.title: Subscribe to history - status change
topic.p: Setup specific history filters (e.g.: Bugs that were reopened, Stories that failed customer sign off) and be notified of changes
